00039 bool TextManager::AddString(const char *text, NiFontPtr font, 
00040                                                         unsigned int flags, unsigned int maxLength,
00041                                                         const NiColorA& color, short x, short y,
00042                                                         StringType type)
00043 {

00045                                                                                  color, x, y);

00062 bool TextManager::Init(NiRenderer* renderer)
00063 {
00064         // create default strings
00065         m_pRenderer = renderer;
00066         NiFontPtr font = ResourceManager::Get()->GetFont
00067                 (ResourceManager::RES_FONT_SELECTEDSOLDIERS);
00068         if (!font) return false;
00069 
00070         bool bSuccess = AddString("", font , NiFontString::COLORED |
00071                 NiFontString::CENTERED, 10, NiColorA(1.0, 1.0, 0.0, 1.0), 50, 20, STRING_SELECTEDSOLDIERS);
00072 
00073         return bSuccess;
00074 }

00082 void TextManager::UpdateText(StringType type, const char* text)
00083 {       
00084         Ni2DStringPtr str = 0;
00085         m_tStrings.GetAt(type, str);
00086         if (str) str->SetText(text);
00087 }

00093 void TextManager::DisplayText()
00094 {
00095         if (m_tStrings.IsEmpty() || !m_pRenderer) return;
00096 
00097         NiTMapIterator it = m_tStrings.GetFirstPos();
00098         StringType type;
00099         Ni2DStringPtr str = 0;
00100         for (int i=0; i<m_tStrings.GetCount(); i++)
00101         {
00102                 m_tStrings.GetNext(it, type, str);
00103                 if (str) str->Draw(m_pRenderer);
00104         }
00105 }
